naslov: Kuća i gospodarska zgrada sa zemljištem u srcu Parka prirode Žumberak (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se seosko imanje na izuzetno mirnoj i atraktivnoj lokaciji u zaštićenom području Parka prirode Žumberak, svega 7 km od Jastrebarskog i 30 km od Zagreba. Imanje se nalazi na južnoj padini poznatog vinorodnog kraja Plešivica, na kraju sela, s prekrasnim otvorenim pogledom na zelene brežuljke i vinograde. Površine objekata: Kuća (tlocrtno 110 m²): sastoji se od podruma, visokog prizemlja s tri sobe, hodnikom, kupaonicom i odvojenim WC-om, te potkrovlja. Gospodarska zgrada: 93 m². Zemljište: Ukupno cca 2000 m². Dokumentacija: Kuća i gospodarska zgrada upisane u vlasnički list. Svi objekti legalni, posjeduju potrebne dozvole. Kuća sagrađena prije 1968. godine – potrebna renovacija i novi krov. Posebnosti: Lokacija na kraju sela – potpuni mir i privatnost. Južna orijentacija s obiljem sunca. Okružena prirodom i vinogradima – idealno za ljubitelje prirode i vina. Blizina renomiranih vinarija (Tomac, Šember, Korak) i restorana (Ivančić). Idealna prilika za mirno stanovanje, vikendicu ili turističku investiciju (seoski turizam, vinski turizam, kuće za odmor). Plešivica je najmanja vinska regija Hrvatske, ali i jedna od najpoznatijih, s tisućljetnom tradicijom vinogradarstva. Ovo područje posljednjih godina postaje sve popularnija destinacija zbog iznimne prirodne ljepote i bogate vinske ponude. Za dodatne informacije i dogovor oko razgleda: + 385 98 196 6835 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor -------------------------- A charming rural property for sale in an exceptionally peaceful and attractive location, situated within the protected area of Žumberak Nature Park, just 7 km from Jastrebarsko and 30 km from Zagreb. The estate is nestled on the southern slopes of the famous Plešivica wine region, at the end of a quiet village, offering stunning open views of green hills and vineyards. Property Details: House (110 m² footprint): Comprises a basement, raised ground floor with three rooms, a hallway, bathroom, and separate WC, as well as an attic. Outbuilding / Farm building: 93 m². Land: Total area approx. 2,000 m². Documentation: Both the house and the outbuilding are registered in the land registry. Fully legal with all necessary permits. Condition: The house was built before 1968. Renovation and a new roof are required. Highlights: End-of-village location ensures complete peace and privacy. South-facing orientation with plenty of sunlight. Surrounded by nature and vineyards – ideal for nature and wine lovers. Close to renowned wineries (Tomac, Šember, Korak) and the popular Ivančić restaurant. This is a perfect opportunity for those seeking a peaceful home, a weekend getaway, or an investment in rural or wine tourism (e.g. holiday home, guesthouse, wine lodge). Plešivica may be Croatia’s smallest wine region, but it is one of the most famous, with a winemaking tradition that spans millennia. In recent years, the area has become a rising destination due to its stunning natural beauty and rich wine culture. For more information or to schedule a viewing: +385 98 196 6835 +385 91 278 9999 +385 1 211 0212 RE/MAX CITY 2 Mlinska 23, Samobor
